# referrerURL

**Instance Property**

The URL of the webpage that linked to the webpage URL.

## Declaration

```swift
var referrerURL: URL? { get set }
```

## Continuing web browsing

- **webpageURL**: The URL of the webpage to load in a browser to continue the activity.
